projects.name: UPSC Preparation App
projects.description: A mobile application to help UPSC aspirants prepare for the examination
highlights: Integrated with Firebase for user authentication and data storage
Real-time chat feature for users to interact with each other
Daily current affairs updates and quizzes
Writing Blog Posts and sharing them with the community
Quiz section with timer and score calculation

projects.name: Workopia-Job Listing Website
projects.description: A job listing website for employers and job seekers to connect
highlights: post job listings and apply for jobs
Google Maps integration for job location
direct connection between employer and job seeker

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase projects and skills
highlights: Responsive design for mobile and desktop
SEO optimization for search engine visibility

projects.name: Chit Chat App
projects.description: A real-time chat application for users to communicate with each other

projects.name: Expense Tracker App
projects.description: A mobile application to track and manage expenses
highlights: Data visualization with charts and graphs

projects.name: Your Location App
projects.description: Mark Your Location and Share with Friends
